title: Air Defense Radar Site Identification
description: An analyst must use electronic intelligence (ELINT) to identify the specific type of an enemy air defense radar site.

tasks.description: Detect the electronic emissions from the radar site.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully detects the radar signal.

tasks.description: Analyze the signal's parameters, such as frequency, pulse repetition interval, and scan pattern.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly characterizes the technical parameters of the signal.

tasks.description: Compare the signal parameters against a threat library to positively identify the radar system (e.g., SA-20).
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst makes a high-confidence identification of the threat system.
